questions.text: What contest did Carla and Diane have?
questions.correct: who could get the most tips
options: who could get the most phone numbers from guys
who could be the fastest waitress
who could spill the least amount of drinks
questions.explanation:
who could get the most tips.

	Carla was always commenting on how she was a better waitress than Diane. In this episode they finally put that to the test by seeing who had the most tips by midnight that night.

questions.text: Who judged the Carla and Diane's contest?
questions.explanation:
Coach.

	At first they wanted Sam to judge but he wanted nothing to do with it. They then chose Coach because he was such an honest man.

questions.correct: there was a spot on his x-ray
options: he ran out of money and couldn't buy any more beer
there was a spot on Vera's x-ray
questions.explanation:
there was a spot on his x-ray.

	Norm didn't know what the spot could be and was scared he was dying. He came in to the bar very depressed and subdued.

questions.text: Did Vera call with good or bad news?
questions.explanation:
good & good news.

	Vera called saying the spot was just a spot on the x-ray not actually on Norm himself. Norm felt much better and decided he needed to spend some time with himself.

questions.text: Who won the contest between Carla and Diane?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	At the last minute Diane got a big tip from a couple celebrating their 50th wedding anniversary. Carla thought they were just some "old geezers" and didn't take their table.

questions.text: Where was Norm planning to go?
questions.explanation:
Bora Bora.

	After Norm found out he was not dying he decided to set sail for Bora Bora. His plan was to build a hut there and then send for Vera. Bora Bora is an island in the French Polynesia.

questions.text: What did Sam say Norm put in the letter?
questions.explanation:
the ha ha's.

	As he read the letter he kept saying, "Ha ha". He then explained that Norm had put it in and it wasn't that Sam thought it was funny.

questions.text: Did anyone cheat in the contest?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Carla tricked Diane into saying she cheated. This got Carla some sympathy, but it was untrue; Diane did not cheat.

questions.text: Who did Sam find in his office?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm chickened out and never went to Bora Bora. He was afraid to face anyone so he had been hiding out in Sam's office.

questions.text: What did Cliff want to be when he grew up?
questions.explanation:
trapeze artist.

	The gang were all telling Norm about dreams they had that were never fulfilled. Diane dreamed of being a ballerina.
